OOC: Sorry about the comment Cyberwolf.  I didnt mean to get you upset.

:::Torca/Orion/Ratchet/Sideswipe/Sky Lynx:::

::Torca escapes the energy blast, the laser blasts, and the grenade but gets 
hit by the plasma and 1 powerful blast.  He is starting to leak mech fluid. 
He fires 5 nails at Astral, 5 at Recklessa, 5 at Dark One, 5 at Sixshot and 5 
at Breakdown.  Starlight's darts hit Orion and and Orion dodges Dark Claw's 
missles and destroys Double Punches missles and gets hit by 2 stinger 
missles.  he fires 1 missle at Starlight, 1 at Dark Claw, 12 optic blasts at 
Injector, and 13 optic blasts in where he hoped Double Punch was.  Ratchet 
dodges Perndabots missles and gets hit by the rifle shots and 3 stinger 
missles.  He fires 8 shots and 1 tusk missle at Fenox, 8 shots at Bumblebee, 
and 9 shots and 1 tusk missle at Scavenger.  Sky Lynx gets hit by 2 of the 
fireballs, and was slightly losing energy.  He fired 2 missles form each gun 
at Pyro.  Sideswipe got hit by ten of the laser blasts and 6 of the shots and 
fires 1 missles and 13 shots at Flesh Ripper, and 1 missle and 12 shots at 
Ares::

--part1_7c.f28e308.2770c4ef_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
